scripts.heroku-postbuild: node frontend/scripts/generate-seo.cjs && VITE_API_URL=/api npm run build --prefix frontend && rm -rf backend/static && mkdir -p backend/static && cp -R frontend/dist/* backend/static/ && mkdir -p backend/static/seo && cp -R frontend/seo/* backend/static/seo/ && find frontend -maxdepth 1 -type f -name '*.html' ! -name 'index.html' -exec cp {} backend/static/ ';'
